isValidSignature(bytes,bytes).code: function isValidSignature(bytes _data, bytes _signature) external view returns (bytes4)

_data.description: Arbitrary length data signed on the behalf of address(this)

_signature.description: Signature byte array associated with _data MUST return the bytes4 magic value 0x20c13b0b when function passes. MUST NOT modify state (using STATICCALL for solc < 0.5, view modifier for solc > 0.5) MUST allow external calls

isValidSignature(bytes,bytes).details: Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data
